document.full_text: the calgary flames have traded young defenseman tim erixon and a fifth-round pick in this month's draft to the new york rangers for junior forward roman horak and two second-round draft choices.
document.title: flames trade prospect erixon to rangers
lines_and_colors: the calgary flames have traded young defenseman tim erixon and a fifth-round pick in this month's draft to the new york rangers for junior forward roman horak and two second-round draft choices.
